ygData.subject: Re: PRisioners of Unicron
ygData.msgSnippet: Injustice:  Heh.  Yeah, thats what you say now, but when I leave, you ll be plotting something.  I *know*. Windlord: Windlord looked him and replied weakly

Injustice:  "Heh.  Yeah, thats what you say now, but when I leave, 
you'll be plotting something.  I *know*."
Windlord: Windlord looked him and replied weakly "Have a law forbide 
prisioners don't plot to get his/her freedom? if it exist, who would 
obey it?"
Injustice: "It's there, for my amusement to see you suffer so!  
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAA!"
Windlord: "If I were you , I wouldn't laught aloud"
Injustice:  "She's too tired to put up a fight.  I have no need to 
fear her."
Windlord: "True"replied Windlord sadly
Injustice:  "Then shut up. Don't talk unless you really have 
something to say." 
Windlord: Windlord thought that this was a good advice and he 
remained in silence
Injustice:  "Better.  Since she is exhausted, I suppose I'll let her 
rest up so she can work later.  But don't get to comfortable, she'll 
be too busy to come, heh heh, spoon feed you!"
Windlord: Windlord didn't say anything, but he was starting to 
really hate Injustice
Injustice:  "Goodnight, parrot.  I have better things to do, like 
luring Megatron up here!  HAHAHAHAHAHA!"
Windlord: "WHAT???? NO!!!" shouted surpriced and shocked
Organics:  The femme finally stirred and woke up, wincing a 
little.  "Wha..?  Whats going on?"
Windlord: The male looked to the room's door watching if Injustice 
was there
Injustice:  "Oh look, you woke her up.  Bad boy!  HahAHA!"
Windlord: "Hadn't you important things to do, Injsutice?"said the 
male weakly but cleary challenging him
Injustice:  "Why you iggnorant little worm!  How dare you!" the 
clone exclaimed angerily.
Organics:  "Shut up Injustice.  I'm too tired to deal with your slag 
right now.
Windlord:Windlord took Organics' hand and squeezed her, If he wasn't 
carefull this situation could end very bad
Injustice:  "Feh.  Whatever.  Just get ready for company, you might 
be having a roommate, parrot."  The clone turned and left the room, 
headed to the Med lab.
Windlord: The male shudder with rage, if he wouldn't be so weak... 
Then he looked to ORganics and he remembered Injustice's words and 
said with low voice "Organics... he knows about MEgatron... I don't 
know how he know but he knows"
Organics:  "Don't worry, he won't get him.  Megatron is so much more 
poweful than i could ever hope to be.  If Injustice wants a piece of 
him, he'd better pack along his coffin."
Windlord: "They could force him some how..."said weackly Windlord
Organics:  "No, he's too smart for that, thy won't get him, it's 
impossible."
Windlord: "I hope that my dear..."said visible tired "I hope that..."
Nightstrike: Door opened again and appeared Nightstrike, who said 
with out emotions "Time over, Organics, said farewell to your 
boyfriend"
Organics:  "Fine.  I'll just go finish a nap in the computer room 
anyway," the femme said as she rested Windlord on the bed and got up 
and walked to the door.
Nightstrik: The male closed the door and follow her  and said "Was 
injustice visited you?"
Organics:  The femme leaned against the wall for a moment, then 
looked up to Nightstrike.  "Yeah.  Why?"
Nightstrike: "Altough I know"said cooly the male"He isn't allowed 
stay there... after he did with your boyfriend"
Organics:  "So why don't you keep a shorter leash on him?  He's a 
grade A nutcase, even compared to the rest of you."
Nightsrike: "I'm a soldier not a baby sitter"replied the male"If you 
have complains about Injustice, you should give them to his creator"
Organics:  "And who would that be?  Who would want that thing as 
their handywork?"
Nightstrike: "It's Hellplague one of femmes fugitives... I guess 
that she liked a boyfriend 'cause Malice just liked 
Blacknightmare...l due that she clone your bro"and added the 
male"But it seems that he liked Blacknightmare too"
Organics:  "You're kidding.  Malice would never even say something 
nice to you creeps.  How could he fall in love with one of you?"
Nightstrike: "I don't know and I don't care"replied the male
Organics:  "Has anyone told you you are as useful as a fist full of 
dust?  You don't know anything!"
Nightstrike: "I'm just worry to fill my obligations, serve Unicron 
and have a nice while"replied Nightstrike"Whatever do others with 
thier lives I don't care"
Organics:  "That's how a lot of soldiers die young.  they don't look 
at anything other han blindly following duty.  It's your spark, do 
whatever."
Nightstrike:"Those femmes not obeyed... and now their lives are 
menaced"
Organics:  "And you don't care?  Are they not family, you're 
supposed to care about family!"
Nightstrike: "They aren't my family... perhaps those femmes are 
sisters, the called each other *Sister*... besides that I don't know 
if they are or not"
Organics:  "WHAT?  You mean you don't even know if they are 
siblings?"  She smacked the male hard across the face, she was 
genuinly disgusted.  "How dare you!  You are lower than the insane 
clone of my brother!  You disgust me!"  At that, she walked into the 
computer room and shut the door.  She sat on the edge of the bed and 
thought, trying to calm down enough to go to sleep.
Nighstrike: The male smiled devilish and said "Big mistake"
Nightstike: After that he walked towards Windlord's room amd change 
the password. Only he could came in.
Nightstrike: the male came in the room Where Organics was
